edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom

Class RandomVariableAtom

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom.Atom
      • edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom.GroundAtom
        • edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom.RandomVariableAtom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Formula

    public class RandomVariableAtom
extends GroundAtom
    A GroundAtom with a truth value and a confidence value which can be modified.

    A GroundAtom is instantiated as a RandomVariableAtom is BOTH of the following conditions are met:

    • it has a StandardPredicate that is open in the Atom's Database
    • it is not persisted in one of its Database's read-only Partitions
